H3.text: Films. Which Dominic starred as Merry (Meriadoc) in ‘The Lord of the Rings’. Monghan

A4.text: He is best known for playing Meriadoc 'Merry' Brandybuck in Peter Jackson's film trilogy The Lord of the Rings (2001–2(markdown)

A5.text: Monaghan later starred in The Lord of the Rings film trilogy as Meriadoc Brandybuck, for which he achieved international acclaim and success.
